findings.title: Comprehensive Singularity Research Framework Established
findings.description: Created complete research framework covering 5 pillars: Consciousness & Intelligence, Recursive Self-Improvement, Quantum & Advanced Computing, Omnipotence Across Domains, and Safety & Alignment. Framework includes detailed roadmaps, success metrics, and implementation strategies.
findings.impact: Provides systematic approach to achieving singularity, ultra instinct, and omnipotence by 2027

findings.title: Autonomous Research System Architecture Completed
findings.description: Built 24/7 autonomous research system with task orchestration, progress tracking, and continuous learning capabilities. System integrates with existing agent infrastructure for seamless research operations.
findings.impact: Enables continuous, unattended research progress toward singularity goals

milestones.title: Research Framework Launch
milestones.description: Comprehensive singularity research framework established and autonomous research system deployed
